com.ibm.wcs.annotationservice

Class AnnotationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.wcs.annotationservice.AnnotationService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class AnnotationService
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Class that encapsulates instantiation and invocation of multiple annotator bundles. An annotator bundle is cached the first time it is instantiated, and the resulting object reused for annotation of multiple documents.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public AnnotationService()

    • Method Detail

      • invoke

        public com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode invoke(AnnotatorBundleConfig cfg,
                                                      com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode document,
                                                      ExecuteParams params)
        Main entry point.
        Parameters:
        cfg - the configuration of the annotator bundle to invoke
        document - the input document as a JSON record; the input document is ontology mapped; this method assumes the input record contains fields containing actual content, but also fields containing metadata (for example, to indicate the language or the content type of the document); this method will not validate that the record conforms to the ontology; FIXME: in v2 we will support additional input 'annotations'
        params - execution parameters for annotating the given input document
        Returns:
        a non-null JSON record consisting of two fields named: AnnotationServiceConstants.ANNOTATIONS_FIELD_NAME and AnnotationServiceConstants.INSTRUMENTATION_INFO_FIELD_NAME, containing the output annotations, and instrumentation info, respectively; the value of the first field is a non-null JSON record with as many fields as output type names in the given annotator bundle config, where each element is a JSON array (potentially empty) containing the annotator results of that type; the value of the second field is a non-null JSON record containing information about: input document size (in characters), running time (in milliseconds), number of annotations output, whether the annotation was interrupted due to running time exceeding the given timeout, and exception information (if any)

      • invokeRaw

        public AnnotatorBundle.RawAnnotationOutputRecord invokeRaw(AnnotatorBundleConfig cfg,
                                                           com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode document,
                                                           ExecuteParams params)
        Entry point for raw annotation record.
        Parameters:
        cfg - the configuration of the annotator bundle to invoke
        document - the input document as a JSON record; the input document is ontology mapped; this method assumes the input record contains fields containing actual content, but also fields containing metadata (for example, to indicate the language or the content type of the document); this method will not validate that the record conforms to the ontology; FIXME: in v2 we will support additional input 'annotations'
        params - execution parameters for annotating the given input document
        Returns:
        a raw annotation output record consisting of two fields named: AnnotationServiceConstants.ANNOTATIONS_FIELD_NAME and AnnotationServiceConstants.INSTRUMENTATION_INFO_FIELD_NAME, containing the output annotations, and instrumentation info, respectively; the value of the first field is a map from fields as output type name in the given annotator bundle config to TupleList which containing the annotator results of that type; the value of the second field is a non-null JSON record containing information about: input document size (in characters), running time (in milliseconds), number of annotations output, exception information (if any), whether the annotation was interrupted due to running time exceeding the given timeout, and whether the annotator completed successfully.

      • getOutputSchema

        public com.fasterxml.jackson.module.jsonSchema.types.ObjectSchema getOutputSchema(AnnotatorBundleConfig cfg,
                                                                                  List<String> inputSchema)
                                                                           throws Exception
        Computes the output schema of this annotator
        Parameters:
        inputSchema - a list of field names already defined in the input schema; will skip processing for field names of output schema if it exists in the input schema
        Returns:
        a JSON Schema of output
        Throws:
        Exception
        See Also:
        AnnotatorWrapperSystemT.getOutputSchema(List), AnnotatorWrapperUIMA#getOutputSchema(List)

                                                                        throws Exception
        Computes the concise output schema of this annotator
        Parameters:
        inputSchema - a list of field names already defined in the input schema; will skip processing for field names of output schema if it exists in the input schema
        Returns:
        an ObjectNode representation of output
        Throws:
        Exception
        See Also:
        AnnotatorWrapperSystemT.getOutputSchema(List), AnnotatorWrapperUIMA#getOutputSchema(List)

        Throws:

      • getNumAnnotatorBundles

        public int getNumAnnotatorBundles()
        Returns:
        the number of annotator bundles cached by this instance of Annotation Service.
